instance.context:
Perhaps a list of some of the `` practices '' of my company will help here . The company grew out of efforts by two completely inexperienced men in their late twenties , neither having a formal education applicable to , or experience in , manufacturing or selling our type of articles . From an initial investment of $ 1200 in 1943 , it has grown , with no additional capital investment , to a present value estimated by some as exceeding $ 10000000 ( we do n't disclose financial figures to the public ) . Its growth continues steadily on a
par with past growth ; and no limitation is in_evidence . Our pin-curl clips and self-locking nuts achieved dominance in just a_few years time , despite substantial , well established competition .

a score of one stroke under
par on a hole ;
